title: Equality Act 2010: how it might affect you
description: How the Equality Act 2010 defines disability, and what law changes mean for the public, businesses, and the public and voluntary sectors.

details.body:
These guides explain the main changes in the law as a result of the Equality Act 2010.

Positive action guidance

Updated guidance for employers on positive action in the workplace was published in April 2023.
